info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 07 at 3:50AM CDT until August 07 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN BEAVER AND NORTHEASTERN TEXAS COUNTIES... At 349 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles east of Boyd, or 12 miles southwest of Beaver, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Turpin, Balko, Baker, Adams, Boyd and Bryans Corner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
